scammer_persona.claimed_identity: Ryan (first victim), Dimensional Fund Advisors investment group representative (second victim)

impersonation_and_psychology.trust_building_period: Sufficient time to establish trust through investment club participation and guided platform setup

temporal_indicators.scam_duration: Weeks to months (involving trading period and withdrawal attempts)

extraction_metadata.notes: HIGH PRIORITY case due to 5 wallet addresses providing strong blockchain tracking opportunity. Two victims with similar attack patterns involving dimensionvip.com. First victim (Ryan contact) experienced deposit-to-withdraw trap. Second victim was recruited via WhatsApp investment club 'Dimensional Fund Advisors' (impersonating legitimate investment firm). Both victims shown fake profits then blocked from withdrawal via fee/deposit demands. Platform now defunct (exit scam). Second victim confirmed minimum $5,000 loss. All 5 Ethereum wallet addresses (0x...) extracted for blockchain analysis. Strong social proof tactic via investment club group. Multiple withdrawal blocking methods indicate sophisticated operation.
